description.p: When you cast a spell you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to or lesser than the spell’s level to imbue it with chaos. For each sorcery point, you may cause a creature affected by the spell to roll on the wild magic table.

sheet.description: When you cast a spell you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to or lesser than the spell’s level to imbue it with chaos. For each sorcery point, you may cause a creature affected by the spell to roll on the wild magic table.

description.p: When you cast a spell you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to imbue it with another spell. For each sorcery point, you may cause a creature affected by the spell to also be affected by another spell of yours that has a level lower than the initial spell. The target automatically fails any saving throws, and any attack rolls automatically succeed.

For each sorcery point, you may cause a creature affected by the spell to also be affected by another spell of yours that has a level lower than the initial spell. The target automatically fails any saving throws, and any attack rolls automatically succeed.

description.p: When you cast a spell you can spend 8 sorcery points to reverse it's intention, causing it to heal creatures instead of damage them.

sheet.description: When you cast a spell you can spend 8 sorcery points to transmute it, causing it to heal creatures instead of damage them.
